ygData.subject: Re: Memmed spells
ygData.msgSnippet: I am at 30th level and i always keep both of the divine spells memed this will give you al full minute of invul and regen some hp and mana back in the process.
ygData.messageBody:
I am at 30th level and i always keep both of the divine spells memed
this will give you al full minute of invul and regen some hp and mana
back in the process. i dont keep gate memed anymore when things get bad
and running is necessary i have 90% of the time been able to sit and mem
gate and get out quickly as a cleric in the healing situation the mobs
will usually follow the tanks when they run leaving you alone thus
giving time to gate out


-----Original Message-----
From: Mr. J Daniels [mailto:warpig@...]
Sent: Tuesday, June 22, 1999 4:33 PM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Memmed spells


From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>

I"m not sure what level you are but gate is not good for safety unless
you
are low level or you are high level fighting greens. When you get to
the mid 20's and start fighting stuff that hits you for mega damage gate
will not work. Divine is the way to go. Now a divine and then gate
when the divine wears off will work..(that is if you are grouped) most
mosnters will move off you when you divine..

Mr. J Daniels


On Tue, 22 Jun 1999, Jeff wrote:

> From: "Jeff" <jeffh@...>
>
> > Wow, no divine aura - brave guy.
> >
>
> Its not so much the, lack of divine aura that I find brave. Its the
fact
> that there is also no gate. Only one is needed to get you out of
trouble.
>
